name: Timezone (Ft. Lily the Fox!)
description:
A 1-minute experience made for a college assignment.

In this game, you control Lily the Fox: a cartoon fox girl with the ability to rewind time! Complete the stage and collect all 96 coins.

I've included the source code for anyone interested on how the mechanics or visual effects were made. Make sure to read the text file included!

Made in GameMaker:Studio 2.3
